嘑字的基本解释

嘑
hū
同“呼”，叫喊。
姓。

嘑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hū］
［《廣韻》荒烏切，平模，曉。］
(1)同“呼”。呼喊；号叫。
(2)同“呼”。呼出气体。参见“嘑吸”。
(3)象声词。
(4)通“滹”。
[②]［hù］
［《集韻》荒故切，去莫，曉。］
(1)呵叱。参见“嘑2爾”。
(2)见“嘑2頭”。

嘑字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嘑； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页205第26
【唐韻】荒烏切【集韻】【正韻】荒胡切，?音呼。【說文】唬也。【玉篇】大聲。【廣韻】口嘑。【周禮·春官】雞人夜嘑旦，以嘂百官。【釋文】嘑，火吳反。　又【集韻】亦姓。　又與滹同。【史記·蘇秦傳】南有嘑沱易水。【集韻】或作?。　又【集韻】【正韻】?荒故切，音戽。義同。　又【孟子】嘑爾而與之。【註】嘑爾，咄啐之貌。　【集韻】本作謼。或作呼。

hū

name.
Babble
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hū］
["Guangyun" Wild Wu cut, flat model, Xiao. ]
(1) Same as "call". Yell; yell.
(2) Same as "call". Exhale. See "Puffing".
(3) Onomatopoeia.
(4) Through "Hu".
[②]［hù］
["Ji Yun" cut the absurdity, go to Mo, Xiao. ]
(1) Huh. See "Bang 2 Er".
(2) See "Bang 2 heads".

[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嘑; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 205 to 26
[Tang Yun] Barren Wu cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Barren Hu cut,? Sound call. [Said the text] Bluff too. [Jade articles] Loudly. [Guangyun] Mouth babble. [Zhou Li·Chun Guan] The rooster screams at night, to smash hundreds of officials. [Explanation] 嘑, Huo Wu anti.　[Jiyun] Also last name.　Same as Hu again. 【Historical Records·Su Qin Biography】South has 嘑沱易水. [Ji Yun] Or make?.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Cut off the absurdity, sound war. The same meaning.　[Mencius] Biao Er and with it. 【Note】Bell, dub appearance.　【Jiyun】This is a 謼. Or make a call.
